Types of Terraform modules Modules are used to create reusable components inside your infrastructure. There are primarily two types of modules depending on how they are written (root and child modules), and depending if they are published or not, we identify two different types as well (local and published).

The evidences provided indicate that Terraform modules are used to create reusable components and make configuration easier to organize, understand, reuse, and share.
